location_schema.concept: A location is a specific context within a map. It includes the project, the state, and the history.

schema.id: string - unique identifier for this location
schema.name: string - human readable name
schema.map_subtype: terminal | ide | browser | container | vps | cicd | cloud | production

state.last_action: string - what was the last thing done here
state.current_objective: string - what are we trying to accomplish
blockers: array of strings - what's stopping progress
next_steps: array of strings - immediate next actions

state.last_action: Extracted Button component to shared library
state.current_objective: Refactor all form components to use new design system
blockers: Waiting on design tokens from design team
next_steps: Update existing forms to use new components

operations.new_location: Create a fresh location for a new project/context
operations.load_location: Resume work at a saved location
operations.search_locations: Find locations by project, state, or time

quick_load: Load location [id]. What was I doing? What's next? Show me the relevant context.
